about_the_game:
STORY

Going down to get to heaven has never been easy.
You are the Fallen, a believer in a higher power who only wanted to enter Paradise. But when you're sent to the depths of Hell, you can only do one thing: travel through the Nine Circles and state your case of innocence to Satan. Everyone has been kind to you so far. Too kind, maybe. Especially the Keeper of Heresy, the Sixth Circle. In the confines of his space while an ash storm rages outside, the two of you pry each other open. But he might break you first.

FEATURES

Loosely based on real world religions and Dante's Inferno, 10:16 is a story about possessiveness, melancholy, and unfamiliar ash.
  • Over 8,000 words
  • Lo-fi and grunge visuals, combining photography with hand-drawn illustrations
  • 6 endings, all of which decide your fate in the Circle of Heresy
  • Steam achievements
  • Full voice acting in English, done by the lovely Zack Valence.

highlighted.name: Laughing with a mouth of ash
There is decay between our teeth

content_descriptors.notes: 10:16 contains themes of violence, possessiveness, and religious trauma. Please proceed at your own cost.

legal_notice: The opening song is a cover of James Gang's "Ashes The Rain and I", performed by Zack Valence and permitted for use under a Distrokid license.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated HD Graphics
  • Storage: 151 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: To get to heaven, you must climb the Nine Circles of Hell. But you might never make it to the depths.
